name: SpeedRooms
description:
A first-person platformer for beginners and experienced speed demons alike. Before you lie 60 rooms, each with their own challenges and time limits, and you must reach the end of each in time. Solving each room is a simple enough task, but to achieve true mastery will require outside the box thinking to find the fastest way to complete each one, and the tenacity to practice enough to perform it flawlessly.

-60 devious rooms filled with puzzles and parkour challenges
-Unlockable challenges for completionists
-Online leaderboard to track your progress against the world
-Controller support if you like that sort of thing

What are you waiting for? Prove yourself as the fastest.
